Requirements: 2.0.1+
Overview: The most beautiful part of this app is a small, configurable widget that places on top of any app and one-click to RAM boost.



How RAM Booster works
RAM Booster is designed to overcome these issues by selectively kill less important apps that are running in the background but consumes considerable deviceÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s memory.
RAM Booster comes with auto-boost in 4 levels: aggressive, strong, medium, gentle.

How to work RAM Booster
There are 5 ways to boost
Ã¢Ëœâ€  Auto-boost: boost automatically under RAM available & timing conditions
Ã¢Ëœâ€  Overlay widget Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Enable RAM Booster overlay widget (on by default), adjust widgetÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s position, and tap on widget to boost anytime you want

Tool:
Ã¢Ëœâ€  1-click cache cleaner

There are plenty options from appÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s settings to twist boosting process:

Ã¢Ëœâ€  Nice themes at your choice
